api/CryptoSteam.CryptoSteamSDK.html.title: Class CryptoSteamSDK | CryptoSteamSDK
api/CryptoSteam.CryptoSteamSDK.html.keywords: Class CryptoSteamSDK Namespace CryptoSteam Assembly CryptoSteamSDKDocs.dll Provides various methods for interacting with the CryptoSteam SDK. public static class CryptoSteamSDK Inheritance object CryptoSteamSDK Methods BuyShopItem(int) Buy shop item. public static Task BuyShopItem(int itemId) Parameters itemId int ID of item Returns Task CreateInvoice(string, string, decimal) Creates an invoice. public static Task<InvoiceResponse> CreateInvoice(string title, string description, decimal amount) Parameters title string The title of the invoice. description string The description of the invoice. amount decimal The amount for the invoice. Returns Task<InvoiceResponse> The response from the invoice creation. GetAchievements() Get all achievements available for game public static Task<Achievement> GetAchievements() Returns Task<Achievement> GetBalance() Retrieves the user's balance. public static Task<string> GetBalance() Returns Task<string> The balance as a string. GetConfig() Retrieves the configuration for loaded game public static GameConfig GetConfig() Returns GameConfig The configuration of game. GetLocale() Get current user locale public static string GetLocale() Returns string User locale GetProfile() Retrieves the user's profile. public static Task<UserProfile> GetProfile() Returns Task<UserProfile> The user's profile. GetShopItem(int) Get shop item public static Task<ShopItem> GetShopItem(int itemId) Parameters itemId int ID of item Returns Task<ShopItem> GetShopItems() Retrieves shop items. public static Task<ShopItemsResponse> GetShopItems() Returns Task<ShopItemsResponse> A list of shop items. GetStartParam() Retrieves any start parameter of the application. Currently used for transferring multiplayer session IDs to games. public static string GetStartParam() Returns string The start parameter. GetValue(string) Key-value storage (similar to PlayerPrefs). Get value. public static string GetValue(string key) Parameters key string Unique key Returns string Value or null if value not exist GetVersion() Retrieves the version of the SDK. public static string GetVersion() Returns string The version string. HideShareButton() Hide share button public static void HideShareButton() IsAdEnabled() Checks if advertisements are enabled. public static Task<bool> IsAdEnabled() Returns Task<bool> True if ads are enabled; otherwise, false. IsAdRunning() Checks if an advertisement is currently running. public static bool IsAdRunning() Returns bool True if an ad is running; otherwise, false. ReloadAd() Reload active advertisement public static void ReloadAd() RequestAd() Requests an advertisement to be shown. public static void RequestAd() SetAchievement(string) Unlock achievement/trophy for player public static void SetAchievement(string id) Parameters id string SetValue(string, string) Key-value storage (similar to PlayerPrefs). Set value. public static void SetValue(string key, string value) Parameters key string Unique key value string Value Share(string) Shares any parameter via the Telegram Share API. Currently used for sharing links to games with multiplayer session ID. public static string Share(string param) Parameters param string The parameter to share. Returns string A result indicating the status of the operation. ShowShareButton(string) Show share button for join new players into multiplayer session right from game overlay public static void ShowShareButton(string roomId) Parameters roomId string Your internal sessionId/roomId TrackGameEvent(string, string) Tracks a custom game event. For example level completions or level ups. public static void TrackGameEvent(string eventName, string eventData) Parameters eventName string Any custom name. E.g. level_completed eventData string Any related data. E.g. completed level name
